title: Wait till it's done, get the output
description: Wait till it's done, get the output

steps: 1. kubectl get jobs -w # wait till 'SUCCESSFUL' is 1 (will take some time, perl image might be big)
2. kubectl get po # get the pod name
3. kubectl logs pi-**** # get the pi numbers
5. kubectl get jobs -w # wait till 'SUCCESSFUL' is 1 (will take some time, perl image might be big)
